title.rendered: Maintain a Healthy Business Amidst COVID-19

content.rendered:
As novel coronavirus, COVID-19, continues to spread, the real estate industry is feeling the impact, and buyers and sellers are feeling the uncertainty as well. In this webinar, MDPP Coaches Sheldon Rapoza and Jenn Tervo will discuss how you can maintain a thriving business during this time.

We’ll share tips for leveraging digital tools to maintain social distance, plus best practices for embracing today’s new market realities.

Disclaimer: Official guidance in regard to COVID-19 is constantly changing. For the most up-to-date and accurate recommendations for your area, please refer to the CDC and your local healthcare authorities.
